column4: I have a SSH connection to my remote server and I need to make some changes to my router settings, but unfortunately lynx doesn't support form buttons properly so I can't save them, any ideas what to try? Is there a better CLI browser or any other ways to do this?
okey thanks, I'll try if that helps.
ouch lol, elinks handles the save buttons, but not the form drop menus :-P Love the TeleWell's software :-)
